title: Maldives Private Island Paradise with Holistic Spa and Wellness Programs
description: Overflowing with emerald palms and lapped by sapphire seas, Naladhu Private Island Maldives is a jewel in the Indian Ocean. This exclusive resort invites you to reconnect with yourself and nature. Immerse yourself in crystalline waters, stretch out on ivory sand and savour ocean-fresh cuisine at the Living Room. To really treat yourself, reset with a multi-day wellness programme for a transformative stay in paradise.
offer_address: Naladhu Private Island - P.O. Box 2098, Veligandu Huraa, South Male Atoll, Maldives
